// =======================================================
// TREDEPICA STORAGE FILTER v8.7
// Protection: Added Gauntlets CR%/CD% with support subs
// Feral: Added as Keep permanent
// Defensive Sets: Added ACC substats, Gauntlets CR%/CD%
// =======================================================

// Auto-sell junk sets
GroupSets = Life/Offense/Resistance/Daze/Frost/Defense/Curing/Divine Offense/Frenzy/Avenging/Destroy/Fury
Sell, Set = GroupSets

// =======================================================
// FERAL SET - KEEP PERMANENT
// =======================================================
Keep, Set = Feral, Rank = 6, Rarity >= Epic

// SPECIAL ACCESSORIES (Cursed City rings/amulets, Spider)
Keep SpecialAcc, Rank = 6, Rarity >= Epic
Keep SpecialAcc, Rank = 5, Rarity >= Epic, Type = R
Keep SpecialAcc, Rank = 5, Rarity >= Epic, Type = A
Keep SpecialAcc, Rank = 5, Rarity >= Epic, Type = N, Sub = SPD
Sell SpecialAcc

// =======================================================
// STANDARD ACCESSORIES v8.6
// =======================================================

Sell Accessory, Rank < 6
Sell Accessory, Rank = 6, Rarity < Epic

// -------------------------------------------------------
// RINGS - Good substats: HP%, DEF%, ATK%
// Flat main (HP/ATK/DEF) can have % subs (HP%/ATK%/DEF%)
// -------------------------------------------------------

// Ring Main: HP (flat) - Subs: HP%, DEF%, ATK%
Upgrade 8 Accessory, Type = R, Main = HP, Level < 8, Sub = HP%, Sub = ATK%/DEF%

Upgrade 12 Accessory, Type = R, Main = HP, Level >= 8, Level < 12, Sub = DEF%1, Sub = ATK%1
Sell Accessory, Type = R, Main = HP, Level >= 8, Level < 12

// -------------------------------------------------------
// BANNERS - Good substats: SPD (mandatory) + HP%, DEF%, ATK%
// Flat main can have all % subs
// ACC/RES main cannot have same stat as sub
// -------------------------------------------------------

// Banner Main: HP (flat) - Subs: SPD + HP%, DEF%, ATK%
